title: paraashakthi janani
sahitya:
paraashakti jananee emai 
paripaalanaipuri parvata kumaari 
(paraashakti)



anupallavi



sooraa soorarpaNi sarOja caraNa 
sundari nincaraNambujam nambinOm 
(paraashakti)



caraNam 1


shankari krupaakari varaapaya karE emai 
yaadari hari sOdari


caraNam 2


taayE parashiva jaayE manaviruL 
maayai yagala aruLvaayE maayE


caraNam 3


kOramahisha samhaarini shyaamaLa
roopiNi simha vaahani mahEshwari
